title: Decompression Challenge
author: John "Halcyon" Styn
content:
Yeah, Decompression is real.

But don’t stew in upset at how the Default World is not like Black Rock City.
Instead, STEP UP and be the person you are in BRC in the Default World.

It will be harder.  You will have less support.
But you owe it to the planet.

You got a golden ticket and got to witness the best of humanity.

Now you are an ambassador.

You have the responsibility to role-model your best to the world.

Practice the Principles. Shine bright, gift big, and live radically.

Give others permission to do the same. Create ripples of inspiration.

This is how we change the world.

Top photo by Craig “Kiwi” Brayton
